description:
The battle heats up for the epic conclusion. Himari gives in to her true demon nature to face Tama, but is she beyond saving? Or will Yuuto finally wield the power within him?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Los gatos, Yuto y la devoción de una doncella
Neko no Yuuto to Otome no Junjou
The Cat, Yuuto, and a Girl`s Pure Heart
猫と優人と乙女の純情
